Comment: A unique ID number for the campaign.
A short, user-defined reference code for the campaign.
Any notes entered for the campaign.
The ID number of the staff member who is assigned as the campaign's owner.
The date the campaign was created on.
The Start Date specified for the campaign.
The date that the campaign was last edited on.
The End Date specified for the campaign.
The ID number of the Stage specified for the campaign, from the CAMPAIGN_STAGE table.
The Estimated Cost entered for the campaign.
The Estimated Revenue amount entered for the campaign.
The Estimated Response entered for the campaign.
The ID number of the Type specified for the campaign, from the CAMPAIGN_TYPE table.
If campaign costs are being tracked by linking the campaign to a job in the EXO Job Costing system, the linked job's ID number is recorded here.
